plugins.adufour.ezplug
Interface EzVar.Storable<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of object to store on disk. Developers are recommended to use simple object types to avoid huge XML parameters files
All Known Implementing Classes:
EzVarBoolean, EzVarDouble, EzVarEnum, EzVarFile, EzVarFloat, EzVarFolder, EzVarInteger, EzVarNumeric, EzVarText
Enclosing class:
EzVar<T>
public static interface EzVar.Storable<T>

Interface allowing variables to be saved and loaded from disk

Author:
Alexandre Dufour
